introContent:
Covid Act Now is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit founded in March 2020. We strive to provide the most timely and accurate local COVID data so that every American can make informed decisions during the pandemic. We are committed to:

* **Data**: We support data and science-backed policies and decision-making
* **Transparency**: Our data and methodologies are fully open-source so that the public can vet, freely use, and build upon our work
* **Accessibility**: We make data universally accessible so that anyone can easily understand and use it, regardless of ability or prior knowledge

partnersContent.copy: Our university affiliates are the [Georgetown University Center for Global Health Science and Security](https://ghss.georgetown.edu/), [Stanford University Clinical Excellence Research Center](http://med.stanford.edu/cerc.html), and [Harvard Global Health Institute](https://globalhealth.harvard.edu/).

partnersContent.copy: We are funded by [Schmidt Futures](https://schmidtfutures.com/), philanthropists, and small donations. We appreciate any contributions you’re able to make [](https://www.gofundme.com/f/qtcuvy-covid-act-now)on our [donate page](https://www.covidactnow.org/donate).

Our data sources include The Department of Health and Human Services, Centers for Medicaid and Medicare Services, The New York Times, Covid Tracking Project, and Covid Care Map. See more details on our [sources](https://docs.google.com/presentation/u/1/d/1XmKCBWYZr9VQKFAdWh_D7pkpGGM_oR9cPjj-UrNdMJQ/edit).

teamIntro: Our multidisciplinary, volunteer-driven team draws on expertise in technology, design, data science, epidemiology, public health, and policy.
